static log_exception (OWLException $exception)

Detailed Description

Default exception handler.

Establish a default exception handler. En exception is thrown whenever a status is set above a specified severity level. These exceptions are caught only by this default handler

Author:
Oscar van Eijk, Oveas Functionality Provider
Version:
Jul 29, 2008 -- O van Eijk -- Initial version
